description: NeoFace Engage is a platform / SDK that developers use to add functionality and video analytics to applications developed using Microsoft Kinect for Windows Software Development Kit 2.0 and Kinect Ambient Intelligence Toolkit . The Kinect Ambient Intelligence Toolkit extracts meta-data from video captured by the Kinect camera. Video is analyzed and meta-data is extracted in real-time including: person dwell-time, spacial data to understand product interactions, and the ability to push data to Azure for storage and cloud computing. When coupled with NeoFace Engage, retailers and others can capture customer demographics and drive targeted content to digital displays, test marketing messages, and capture consumer / product interactions per demographic.
releaseNotes:
NeoFace Engage is available for a free 30-day trial subsequent to registration and activation. After installing, NeoFace Engage will function for 5-days until activation is required.

Change log for V 1.0.1

 1. Dependencies and EULA would not be visible in the project
 2. Documentation and license agreement files are moved to doc folder under the project
 3. The framework is targeted to 4.5
 4. Install and uninstall scripts are added to organize the dependencies.

Changes in V 1.0.2

1. MAFunc_x64.dll is not tied to VC++ redist 9.0.30729.6161.
2. copied vcomp90.dll as part of the dependencies.

Changes in V 1.0.3
1. Added LicenseActivator.exe as part of the dependencies.
2. renamed the dependencies folder as NEC_dependencies.
3. moved NEC_Dependencies and docs folder to content and removed it from showing in the IDE.

Changes to V1.0.4
1.install.ps1 will copy the NEC_Dependencies to the project path.

Changes to V1.0.5
1. build script directly copies from the packages folder.
